Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class SchoolBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.SchoolBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class SchoolBoardController extends Object implements GUIController
This class is the controller of the school board view.
